name: Free Online PDF Table of Contents Auto Generator - ATools
description: Free online PDF TOC generator: Enter page numbers and titles, automatically generate table of contents page and insert into PDF (pure frontend local processing).
seoDescription: Free online PDF table of contents auto generator that supports uploading PDF and generating TOC pages based on your provided 'page number + title' list, with options to insert at the beginning of PDF and automatically adjust page numbering. Pure frontend local operation without file uploads, suitable for quickly adding TOC pages to books, reports, tender documents, etc.

ui.tocFormatHint: Line format: Page Number TAB Title (or "Page Number: Title").
ui.shiftPageNumbers: TOC page numbers auto +1 after insertion (only effective when inserting at beginning)
ui.tip: Tip: This tool does not automatically recognize PDF title hierarchy (frontend limitation). It's recommended to manually organize page numbers and titles using outline/bookmark information first, then generate and insert TOC pages.
ui.parseError: PDF parsing failed (possibly encrypted PDF or corrupted file).
